title: AmLactin 12 % Moisturizing Lotion - 567 g / 20 oz
description: The active ingredient is 12% lactic acid neutralized with ammonium hydroxide. This natural AHA is equivalent to other prescription lactic acid moisturizing agents. Great for seriously dry skin conditions like eczema, icthyoses, psoriasis and keratosis pilaris. In a lighter base for those with oilier skin types, or those who live in humid climates. Supplied In Pump Action Bottle.

title: Glytone Body Lotion, 8.4-Ounce Package
description: To retexturize.  Powerful glycolic acid lotion help visibly reduce rough, uneven skin for renewed smoothness.  17.5% glycolic acid.

title: The Original Hyaluronic Acid Serum 100% Pure 2 oz.
description: The Original Hyaluronic Acid Serum 100% Pure 2 oz.
